articles.description: Saturday's Merseyside derby between Everton and Liverpool at Goodison Park is postponed because of adverse weather conditions during Storm Darragh.

articles.description: Jacob Bethell strokes 96 after Gus Atkinson's hat-trick as England take a stranglehold on the second Test against New Zealand.

articles.description: New head coach Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "a massive club but not a massive team" as he tries to steer the club back towards the top of the English game.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "a massive club but not a massive team" says

articles.description: Gus Atkinson takes the 15th hat-trick by an England bowler to rattle through the New Zealand tail on the second day of the second Test in Wellington.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Gus Atkinson takes hat-trick in second Test in Wellington

articles.description: Bath fall short of completing a thrilling comeback in torrential conditions at the Rec as La Rochelle hold on to claim an opening-game victory in the Champions Cup.
articles.title: Bath 20-24 La Rochelle: Two-time winners hold off Bath fightback

articles.description: Under-pressure manager Julen Lopetegui says "we are going to change the situation" at struggling West Ham.

articles.description: Australian teenage sensation Gout Gout enters the record books by becoming the fastest 16-year-old in history over 200 metres.
articles.title: Gout Gout: Australian 16-year-old breaks 200m record in 20.04secs during school championships
